snippet.title: The Holy Grail walkthrough (Apple II - Hayden Software)
snippet.description:
"For centuries, valiant knights have pursued in vain the fabled Holy Grail. And now a man of tyranny, your stepbrother Balnard, is closing in on it and would use its power to dominate the land. The people of the world look to you, brave adventurer, to save them from this dreaded fate."

The Holy Grail (https://mocagh.org/loadpage.php?getgame=theholygrail) was a text adventure game published by Hayden Software in 1984 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - solution archive.com (Juan Duc)
